summary: REQ-13 appears partially implemented via a new documentation file (frontend/CONTENT_EDITING_GUIDE.md), but the diff content is truncated too early to verify that all required sections, file lists, image replacement instructions, and end-to-end examples are present. Additionally, two repo/meta summary files were modified that were not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to add a developer-facing content editing guide (documentation). No requirement requested updating a generated/summary file.
BuildRequest did not request changes to project tracking/state metadata; scope was limited to documentation and existing frontend content/config locations for guidance.
